name: Add a book with an invalid ISBN to the user's collection

steps.name: Given I have a valid user and token
When I send a POST request to add book with ISBN "invalid-isbn-123" to the user's account
Then the response status code should be 400
And the response should contain "ISBN supplied is not available in Books Collection!"

fullName: Book Store API functionality: Add a book with an invalid ISBN to the user's collection
